definedProcessProperty.helpText: In order to define custom mapping for rehire processing, set this property to true. It will disable use of default data map for rehire.
definedProcessProperty.label: _EnableCustomMappingForRehire

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Enable processing of rehire employees. Configure data maps for rehire processing.
definedProcessProperty.label: _ProcessRehires

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Enable processing of extended data map1 for rehire processing. By default extended maps are not processed.
definedProcessProperty.label: _ProcessExtendedMapForRehire1

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Enable processing of extended data map2 for rehire processing. By default extended maps are not processed.
definedProcessProperty.label: _ProcessExtendedMapForRehire2

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Enable processing of extended data map3 for rehire processing. By default extended maps are not processed.
definedProcessProperty.label: _ProcessExtendedMapForRehire3

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Enable processing of extended data map4 for rehire processing. By default extended maps are not processed.
definedProcessProperty.label: _ProcessExtendedMapForRehire4

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Select the timeframe for retrieving existing person data based on hyperfind id and payperiod selected. Default payperiod used is "Today".
definedProcessProperty.label: PayPeriodForRehire

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Inorder to fetch existing person data based on hyperfind id and payperiod span, specify the value in format "mm/dd/yyyy mm/dd/yyyy".
definedProcessProperty.label: _PayPeriodSpanForRehire

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Limit to fetch existing persons data.
definedProcessProperty.label: _ThresholdRehire

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Default employment status effective date for processing rehire in YYYY-MM-DD format.
definedProcessProperty.label: EmploymentStatusEffDateForRehire

definedProcessProperty.helpText: Set it true to provide fixed length profile mapping for data transformation.
definedProcessProperty.label: _EnableFixedLengthProfileMapping
